definition: to care about/to take seriously/to take to heart
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]

sentences.english: Don't take it to heart. They are just babes and sucklings.
sentences.chinese: 不要放在心上，那些只是些乳臭未乾的小子。

sentences.english: Distractions and annoyances are plentiful but don’t let the minor things get under your skin.
sentences.chinese: 爲瑣事分心和惱怒很常見，但是不要放在心上。

sentences.english: Keeping you in my heart , together my hands putting.
sentences.chinese: 把你放在心上，合起了手掌。

sentences.english: Set me as a seal upon thine heart.
sentences.chinese: 求伱將我放在心上如印記。

sentences.english: He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
sentences.chinese: 對於世俗名利，他總是漠然置之，不放在心上。

sentences.english: Yes, I have already cursed them, because you have not set your heart to honor me.
sentences.chinese: 因你們不把誡命放在心上，我已經咒詛你們了。

sentences.english: Do not take the stresses generated by gossip to heart, for it will taint your nature.
sentences.chinese: 人我是非的煩惱不要放在心上，會污染本性。

sentences.english: Wei Ziqi laughed when he told the story; he didn’t take it personally.
sentences.chinese: 魏子旗笑着告訴我這些，他並沒有把這些放在心上。

sentences.english: Put you is the matter, closed the palm.
sentences.chinese: 把你放在心上，合起了手掌。

sentences.english: But despite my disgruntlement, I dismissed the incident.
sentences.chinese: 但是，雖然我的不滿，我沒把這事放在心上。

sentences.english: We have your interests at heart.
sentences.chinese: 我們會把你的利益放在心上。

sentences.english: Forget it, John. it's not a very important letter anyway.
sentences.chinese: 不用放在心上，約翰，反正那封信也不怎麼重要。

sentences.english: In the lyrics does not have the shadow evil spirit to bond, do not place on the heart.
sentences.chinese: 歌詞中沒有陰影魔障，千萬不要放在心上。

sentences.english: He does not mind how the armed forces of the Qin.
sentences.chinese: 他就不怎麼把秦國的軍隊放在心上了。

sentences.english: But she is nothing to me now.
sentences.chinese: 可是現在我可不把她放在心上了。

sentences.english: He always has the country in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他總是把國家放在心上。

definition: to take seriously (often with negative expression: "don't take it too seriously")/to treat conscientiously
to care about/to mind
to pay attention to/to care about/to attach importance to
to pay no attention to/not to mind
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to care about/equivalent of 在於|在于[zai4 yu2]
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to mind/to brood over/to be concerned about
from the start/absolutely/entirely/simply
not to mind/unconcerned
to care about/to take offense/to mind
to heed/to pay attention to
not to care
to dismiss with a laugh/to make light of
to have misgivings/apprehension/worry/qualm/scruple
to show an interest in/to get involved with
